name: LOGIN
desc: Allows logging in to the system

name: WORKFLOW-CONTROL
desc: Allows starting, stopping, resetting, updating workflows, changing statuses, etc

name: SERVICE-CONTROL
desc: Allows services to be stopped / deleted

name: EDIT-WORKFLOW-DATA
desc: Allows workflow data to be edited

name: CALL-USER-SERVICES-RO
desc: Allows read-only user services to be called

name: CALL-USER-SERVICES-RW
desc: Allows all user services to be called

name: CALL-SYSTEM-SERVICES-RO
desc: Allows read-only system services to be called

name: CALL-SYSTEM-SERVICES-RW
desc: Allows all system services to be called

name: USER-CONTROL
desc: Allows creating, deleting, changing users and profiles

name: SUBMIT-ORDER
desc: Allows submitting order data for a workflow

name: GROUP-CONTROL
desc: Allows creating, changing, and deleting workflow/service groups

name: SERVER-CONTROL
desc: Allows controlling the Qorus server (adding or removing listeners, etc)

name: SCHEMA-CONTROL
desc: Allows maintenance of the system DB schema

name: SELECT-DATASOURCE
desc: Allows executing select statements over the REST API on a datasource

name: MODIFY-DATASOURCE
desc: Allows modifying existing datasources and flushing the configuration to a file

name: SQLUTIL-READ
desc: Allows the user to execute remote read operations on the sqlutil service

name: SQLUTIL-WRITE
desc: Allows the user to execute remote write operations on the sqlutil service

name: FILESYSTEM-CONTROL
desc: Allows the user to read and write to the filesystem

name: FILESYSTEM-READ
desc: Allows the user to write to the filesystem

name: FILESYSTEM-WRITE
desc: Allows the user to write to the filesystem

name: LOCK-WORKFLOW-ORDER
desc: Allows acquiring and releasing exclusive operator locks on workflow order instances

name: BREAK-WORKFLOW-ORDER-LOCK
desc: Allows breaking exclusive operator locks acquired by other users on workflow order instances

name: SERVER-CONNECTION-CONTROL
desc: Allows the user to manage Qorus <-> Qorus server connections

name: READ-SERVER-CONNECTION
desc: Allows the user to read Qorus <-> Qorus server connections

name: RELOAD-SERVER-CONNECTION
desc: Allows the user to reload Qorus <-> Qorus connections

name: USER-CONNECTION-CONTROL
desc: Allows the user to manage user connections

name: READ-USER-CONNECTION
desc: Allows the user to read user connections

name: RELOAD-USER-CONNECTION
desc: Allows the user to reload user connections

name: ADD-USER-CONNECTION
desc: Allows the user to add user connections

name: MODIFY-USER-CONNECTION
desc: Allows the user to modify user connections

name: DELETE-USER-CONNECTION
desc: Allows the user to delete user connections

name: FLUSH-DATASOURCE
desc: Allows the user to flush all cached datasource information to the configuration file

name: RELOAD-DATASOURCE
desc: Allows the user to reload all datasources from the source file

name: SET-PROPERTY
desc: Allows creating or modifying system properties

name: RELOAD-PROPERTIES
desc: Allows reloading system properties from the database

name: WORKFLOW-EXEC-CONTROL
desc: Allows starting, stopping, resetting workflows and changing workflow options

name: WORKFLOW-ERROR-CONTROL
desc: Allows workflow errors to be created, changed, and deleted

name: WORKFLOW-ORDER-CONTROL
desc: Allows manipulating workflow order data such as retrying, blocking, rescheduling, and reprioritizing worklfow order data

name: SET-WORKFLOW-ORDER-ERROR
desc: Allows setting workflow orders to ERROR

name: SET-ORDER-INFO
desc: Allows for setting order username and comment info

name: RELOAD-RBAC
desc: Allows RBAC info to be reloaded from the database

name: MODIFY-GROUP-STATUS
desc: Allows enabling and disabling interface groups
